body.p: Personally appeared before me the undersigned a Justice of the Peace for Franklin County duly commissioned and acting as such under the Laws of Kentucky Jere South who made oath that he is the Keeper of the Kentucky Penitentiary; that George Woodruff a convict confined upon a judgment of the Jefferson Circuit Court and sentenced to five years imprisonment, escaped from said Prison on the 2nd of October 1860 and is now at large a Fugitive from the justice of this State, and is as he believes & is informed now in the state of Louisiana.
Given under my hand this 22 day of November 1860.

J W South
Keeper of Ky Penitentiary

Sworn to by SJere South this 22 Nov 1860
Geo W. Gwin J. P.
Franklin County Ky
